languages.text: {n}Взгляд Хейнрикса обращается в вашу сторону — и теперь ежиться приходится вам, ибо вас обволакивает льдистый туман.{/n} "Потому что это наскоро состряпанная байка, способная обмануть лишь наивного простака. Если тебе угодно верить врагу Человечества на слово — таков твой прискорбный выбор. Но пока я не получу более весомых доказательств измены Ахиллеаса Скаландра, чем этот убогий лепет, я не сменю своего мнения. Ни сейчас, ни потом".

{n}Heinrix's gaze turns on you — and you are suddenly trembling, enveloped in an icy fog.{/n} "Because it is a hastily concocted tale that would fool only a naive simpleton. If you wish to trust the word of an enemy of Humanity, that is your unfortunate choice to make. But until I have better proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than this pathetic prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Хейнрикса обращается в вашу сторону — и теперь ежиться приходится вам, ибо вас обволакивает льдистый туман.{/n} "Потому что это наскоро состряпанная байка, способная обмануть лишь наивного простака. Если тебе угодно верить врагу Человечества на слово — таков твой прискорбный выбор. Но пока я не получу более весомых доказательств измены Ахиллеаса Скаландра, чем этот убогий лепет, я не сменю своего мнения. Ни сейчас, ни потом".

But until I have better proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than this pathetic prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、あなたに視線を移す…すると、あなたは突然氷霧に包まれ、身体が震え出す。{/n}「急なでっち上げでだませるのは、世間知らずなめでたい奴だけだ。人類の敵の言葉を信じたいなら、それは嘆かわしいがお前の選択というもの。しかし、この馬鹿なおしゃべりより信頼に足る、アキレアス・スカランダーの反逆の証拠を見つけるまで、俺は考えを変えるつもりはない。今も、これからもだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's gaze turns on you — and you are suddenly trembling, enveloped in an icy fog.{/n} "Because it is a hastily concocted tale that would fool only a naive simpleton. If you wish to trust the word of an enemy of Humanity, that is your unfortunate choice to make. But until I have better proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than this pathetic prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、あなたに視線を移す…すると、あなたは突然氷霧に包まれ、身体が震え出す。{/n}「急なでっち上げでだませるのは、世間知らずなめでたい奴だけだ。人類の敵の言葉を信じたいなら、それは嘆かわしいがお前の選択というもの。しかし、この馬鹿なおしゃべりより信頼に足る、アキレアス・スカランダーの反逆の証拠を見つけるまで、俺は考えを変えるつもりはない。今も、これからもだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希将目光转向你，一层冰雾扑面而来，你不自觉地打了个寒战。{/n}“因为这一看就是个匆忙编造的故事，只能糊弄最愚蠢的傻瓜。如果你选择相信人类之敌的谎言，那将会是最令人遗憾的决定。除非能找到铁证，证明阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德的背叛行为，否则不要妄想我会相信这一派胡言。我现在不会相信，未来也不会相信。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's gaze turns on you — and you are suddenly trembling, enveloped in an icy fog.{/n} "Because it is a hastily concocted tale that would fool only a naive simpleton. If you wish to trust the word of an enemy of Humanity, that is your unfortunate choice to make. But until I have better proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than this pathetic prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希将目光转向你，一层冰雾扑面而来，你不自觉地打了个寒战。{/n}“因为这一看就是个匆忙编造的故事，只能糊弄最愚蠢的傻瓜。如果你选择相信人类之敌的谎言，那将会是最令人遗憾的决定。除非能找到铁证，证明阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德的背叛行为，否则不要妄想我会相信这一派胡言。我现在不会相信，未来也不会相信。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le regard d'Heinrix se tourne vers vous... et vous êtes soudain {mf|pris|prise} de tremblements sous l'effet du brouillard glacial qui vous enveloppe.{/n} « Car il s'agit d'une fable conçue à la hâte qui ne tromperait qu'un imbécile naïf. Si vous souhaitez accorder votre confiance aux dires d'un ennemi de l'humanité, ce choix regrettable n'appartient qu'à vous. Mais je ne changerai pas d'avis tant que je n'aurai pas obtenu une preuve plus tangible de la trahison d'Achilleas Scalander que ces racontars pathétiques. Ni maintenant, ni jamais. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's gaze turns on you — and you are suddenly trembling, enveloped in an icy fog.{/n} "Because it is a hastily concocted tale that would fool only a naive simpleton. If you wish to trust the word of an enemy of Humanity, that is your unfortunate choice to make. But until I have better proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than this pathetic prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard d'Heinrix se tourne vers vous... et vous êtes soudain {mf|pris|prise} de tremblements sous l'effet du brouillard glacial qui vous enveloppe.{/n} « Car il s'agit d'une fable conçue à la hâte qui ne tromperait qu'un imbécile naïf. Si vous souhaitez accorder votre confiance aux dires d'un ennemi de l'humanité, ce choix regrettable n'appartient qu'à vous. Mais je ne changerai pas d'avis tant que je n'aurai pas obtenu une preuve plus tangible de la trahison d'Achilleas Scalander que ces racontars pathétiques. Ni maintenant, ni jamais. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Heinrix se vuelve hacia ti y de repente te echas a temblar, {mf|envuelto|envuelta} en una niebla helada.{/n} «Porque no son más que patrañas que solo engañarían a un tonto de remate. Si quiere confiar en la palabra de un enemigo de la Humanidad, allá usted. Pero hasta que tenga mejores pruebas de la traición de Achilleas Scalander que no sean meras habladurías, no cambiaré de opinión. Ni ahora, ni nunca».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's gaze turns on you — and you are suddenly trembling, enveloped in an icy fog.{/n} "Because it is a hastily concocted tale that would fool only a naive simpleton. If you wish to trust the word of an enemy of Humanity, that is your unfortunate choice to make. But until I have better proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than this pathetic prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Heinrix se vuelve hacia ti y de repente te echas a temblar, {mf|envuelto|envuelta} en una niebla helada.{/n} «Porque no son más que patrañas que solo engañarían a un tonto de remate. Si quiere confiar en la palabra de un enemigo de la Humanidad, allá usted. Pero hasta que tenga mejores pruebas de la traición de Achilleas Scalander que no sean meras habladurías, no cambiaré de opinión. Ni ahora, ni nunca».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrixs Blick wandert zu dir ... und du beginnst zu zittern, als du in einen eisigen Nebel gehüllt wirst.{/n} "Weil es eine hastig zusammengeschusterte Geschichte ist, auf die nur ein naiver Einfaltspinsel hereinfallen würde. Wenn Ihr dem Wort eines Feindes der Menschheit glauben wollt, müsst Ihr diese unerfreuliche Entscheidung treffen. Aber solange ich keinen besseren Beweis für Achilleas Scalanders Verrat habe, als dieses jämmerliche Geschwätz, werde ich meine Meinung nicht ändern. Jetzt nicht und auch in Zukunft nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's gaze turns on you — and you are suddenly trembling, enveloped in an icy fog.{/n} "Because it is a hastily concocted tale that would fool only a naive simpleton. If you wish to trust the word of an enemy of Humanity, that is your unfortunate choice to make. But until I have better proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than this pathetic prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrixs Blick wandert zu dir ... und du beginnst zu zittern, als du in einen eisigen Nebel gehüllt wirst.{/n} "Weil es eine hastig zusammengeschusterte Geschichte ist, auf die nur ein naiver Einfaltspinsel hereinfallen würde. Wenn Ihr dem Wort eines Feindes der Menschheit glauben wollt, müsst Ihr diese unerfreuliche Entscheidung treffen. Aber solange ich keinen besseren Beweis für Achilleas Scalanders Verrat habe, als dieses jämmerliche Geschwätz, werde ich meine Meinung nicht ändern. Jetzt nicht und auch in Zukunft nicht."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in bakışları sana dönüyor... Etrafın dondurucu bir sisle kaplanıyor, bir anda titremeye başlıyorsun.{/n} "Düşünmüyorum çünkü alelacele uydurulmuş bir yalan bu. Buna ancak katıksız salaklar inanır. Eğer İnsanlığın düşmanlarından birinin lafına inanacaksan buyur, böyle kötü kararlar vermek sana kalmış. Ancak bu boş lafları kanıttan saymıyorum, Achilleas Scalander'ın ihanetinin kanıtını bulana kadar da kararımdan dönmeyeceğim. Ne şimdi, ne de asla."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's gaze turns on you — and you are suddenly trembling, enveloped in an icy fog.{/n} "Because it is a hastily concocted tale that would fool only a naive simpleton. If you wish to trust the word of an enemy of Humanity, that is your unfortunate choice to make. But until I have better proof of Achilleas Scalander's treason than this pathetic prattle, I will not change my mind. Not now, not ever."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in bakışları sana dönüyor... Etrafın dondurucu bir sisle kaplanıyor; bir anda titremeye başlıyorsun.{/n} "Düşünmüyorum çünkü alelacele uydurulmuş bir yalan bu. Buna ancak katıksız salaklar inanır. Eğer İnsanlığın düşmanlarından birinin lafına inanacaksan buyur; öyle kötü kararlar vermek sana kalmış. Ancak bu boş lafları kanıttan saymıyorum ve Achilleas Scalander'ın ihanetinin kanıtını bulana kadar da kararımı değiştirmem. Ne şimdi, ne de asla."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
